title: Designing Self-Assessment for 21st-Century Skills to Strengthen Maker Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic maker activity experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Applying gamification and personalized learning design in project-based assessment environments

learning_goals: Learners can regularly self-assess 21st-century competencies (creativity, collaboration, critical thinking) during maker projects
Gamification elements (level-up, reward systems) motivate competency development and foster habits of continuous reflection
Customized activities can be designed and executed according to individually set maker learning goals and schedules over a 2-4 week period

resources: Maker kit (3D pen, simple electronic components, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
